WorkItem.Description:
Add new Flintlocke's Woodchucker bow/gun enchant: http://ptr.wowhead.com/spell=99623 (Personal note, best enchant ever)
 
Need to add the Physical part to the Hunter Model.
 
Testing needs to be done on the PTR to find out how much damage is done by the enchant and what the cooldown is.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Implement new PTR Bow/Gun Enchant Flintlocke's Woodchucker

Comments.Message: Changing this to be marked under Hunter, since it's the only model this applies to.

Small update. In addition to the 300 Agility from this proc, between these two spells:

http://ptr.wowhead.com/spell=99621
http://ptr.wowhead.com/spell=99622

We can safely deduce that the physical damage ranges from 550 - 1650 damage, with a 10% chance to proc. Elitist Jerks are currently hypothesizing that the cooldown is the same as that of Gnomish X-Ray Scope, which is at a 45 second cooldown.

The proc lasts for 10 seconds.
Implemented for next version by commit 63386
